tag_list: phishing, identity-fraud, spam, viruses, adware, spyware, internet-security
overview: ITM Secure is a new Internet security service that tests and certifies sites to protect customers from various security hazards on the web. ITM Secure speciaists perform tests to protect users from phishing, identity fraud, spam, viruses, adware, spyware, etc. All sites that have successfully passed security test are provided with ITM Secure trustmark.
